title: [MC1.8]|Command_Block||原创||支持多人|我的世界1.8原版饮水模组
author: Sao_N
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Sao_N 于 2015-7-31 20:45 编辑 

                                                     前言

此原版模组是依据这个帖子修改的。请勿使用快照版本来游玩本模组，出任何事情本人一律不负责。（随便弄着玩的，但是是真的不能用快照版本）


[fly]分割线[/fly]


使用方法              
                        
输入指令

生成柱子

生成系统

饮水值

状态1

状态2

状态3
状态4

状态
water=40  虚弱效果
water=30  缓慢效果
water=20  中毒效果
water=10  无
water=5    瞬间伤害2（直接死）

命令/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-22 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~-12 ~6 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-11 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-10 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-9 ~9 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard players set @a[score_wt_min=101] wt 100"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-8 ~9 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard players set @a[score_wb_min=1] wb 0"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard players add @a[score_wb_min=1] wt 5"},Riding:{}}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-7 ~8 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard players remove @a[score_times_min=200] wt 1"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard players add @a times 1"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/effect @a[score_wt_min=10,score_wt=10] 19 9999 1"},Riding:{}}}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-6 ~8 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard players set @a[score_times_min=201] times 0"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/title @a[score_wt_min=10,score_wt=10] title {text:\\"\\",extra:[{text:\\"你现在头昏眼花\\",color:blue,bold:true}]}"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/effect @a[score_wt_min=10,score_wt=10] 19 9999 1"},Riding:{}}}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-5 ~7 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/title @a[score_wt_min=20,score_wt=20] title {text:\\"\\",extra:[{text:\\"你现在必须立即喝水!\\",color:red,bold:true}]}"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/title @a[score_wt_min=30,score_wt=30] title {text:\\"\\",extra:[{text:\\"你现在有点不行了\\",color:red,bold:true}]}"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/title @a[score_wt_min=40,score_wt=40] title {text:\\"\\",extra:[{text:\\"你现在有点渴了\\",color:red,bold:true}]}"},Riding:{}}}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-4 ~7 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/effect @a[score_wt_min=20,score_wt=20] 19 9999 1"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/effect @a[score_wt_min=30,score_wt=30] 2 9999 1"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/effect @a[score_wt_min=40,score_wt=40] 18 9999 2"},Riding:{}}}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-3 ~6 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/effect @a[score_wb_min=1] 4 0"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/effect @a[score_wb_min=1] 19 0"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~-1 ~2 ~ ~-1 ~ ~4 redstone_block 0"},Riding:{}}}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-2 ~6 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/effect @a[score_wb_min=1] 2 0"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/effect @a[score_wb_min=1] 18 0"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~1 ~2 ~ ~1 ~ ~4 stone 0"},Riding:{}}}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~1 ~-1 ~6 ~3 ~1 ~10 air 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~3 ~11 stained_glass 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~ ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~2 ~3 ~4 wall_sign 1 replace {Text1:"{text:\\"=================================================\\",bold:True,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~2 ~8 air\\"}}",Text2:"{text:\\"原版支持多人饮水模组 BY：Sao_N\\",bold:True,italic:False,underlined:True,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~2 ~8 air\\"}}",Text3:"{text:\\"关闭系统\\",bold:True,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:True,color:red,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~2 ~8 air\\"}}",Text4:"{text:\\"==============================================================\\",bold:True,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:blue,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~2 ~8 air\\"}}"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar wt"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard players set @a wt 100"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard objectives add k deathCount"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard objectives add wb stat.useItem.minecraft.potion"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard objectives add wt dummy Water"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard objectives add times dummy"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~26 ~1 air"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码


[fly]END[/fly]
